duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and implement BI solutions using Power BI, Power Automate, and PowerApps to enhance data visualization and automation.
Create and maintain complex data models and data transformation processes using SQL, DAX, and Shell scripts.
Collaborate with stakeholders and leadership to understand business requirements and deliver high-quality BI solutions.
Work on cloud-based databases to analyze, design, and implement data models for efficient data storage and retrieval.
Provide support for data visualization, reporting, and dashboard development for business users and management.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field (Master's preferred)
